tool.name: Cluster outputs (pm-muairs_read)
tool.command: pip show pymuon-suite || ( git clone https://github.com/muon-spectroscopy-computational-project/pymuon-suite /tmp/pymuon-suite && pip install /tmp/pymuon-suite && rm -rf /tmp/pymuon-suite) && unzip $folder && out_folder="`python ${__tool_directory__}/get_out_folder.py`" && pm-muairss -t r input.cell params.yaml && zip -r out_zip.zip \$out_folder *_clusters* param.yaml input.cell && find \$out_folder > tree.txt
tool.help:
usage: pm-muairss [-h] [-t {r,w}] structures parameter_file
Given an input structure, generates a set of structures with a muon added in a random location.
